name: Bloodlust 2: The Secret of Santa Monica
name_original: Bloodlust 2: The Secret of Santa Monica
description:
Bloodlust 2: The Secret of Santa Monica is a point & click adventure based on the universe of Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines. 

The game is in development using Unity 2020.3 and PowerQuest. 
Check out the demo on itchio! I'm not sure if saving and loading are working properly, so be patient. And don't forget to comment all your feedback. Thanks for playing! 

CONTROLS

  • Left click = interact with items
  • TAB = highlight all items in the room
  • Q = open/close quest journal
